channel.title: Getting attacked by Possessor as MM makes Princess wisp say u attacked
channel.description: I was Mastermind, Princess wisped me night Possessor attacked me. It made her wisp say I attacked. Obviously it shouldn't have. I assume the feedback got confused with the puppet string's two targets. Very aggravating to lose a game because of a stupid bug. There was nobody to mindwarp the Princess or frame me. output_log.txt (326.6 KB)

item.title: Getting attacked by Possessor as MM makes Princess wisp say u attacked
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
I was Mastermind, Princess wisped me night Possessor attacked me. It made her wisp say I attacked.

Obviously it shouldn’t have. I assume the feedback got confused with the puppet string’s two targets.

Very aggravating to lose a game because of a stupid bug.

There was nobody to mindwarp the Princess or frame me.

output_log.txt (326.6 KB)
